title: REDice
author: REDice
content: i will sell token atleast 5000 crEx for each $0.10 for liquidity . BNB Smart Chain network. https://bscscan.com/token/0x622Ee5Bd460bdb9F87e4a5Bc1674bf046ef301BA  interested to hold, you must have trustwallet or metamask BNB Smart Chain network. i am working to put value of this coin.

Considering that the maximum saplay CryEx is 1 billion tokens and your plan is to sell it by 10 cents, it is not difficult to calculate that you dream of getting 100 million dollars in this way. Well, it's not harmful to dream, but I don't understand why you decided that investors would buy this token at $0.1?
